post:
Bigpowerhosting is a leading provider in VPS and Dedicated Servers in New York,Miami,And Los Angeles . We strive to provide great quality virtual servers and other products for a fair price, and giving you the peace of mind that your server will be online 24/7/365. All of our services are self managed but include basic support and technical troubleshooting on a best-effort basis. Our network provides complete DDoS mitigation against malicious network attacks, and is located perfectly for good latency throughout America and Europe.

Use coupon "60off" to get 60% off for life. coupon only good while supplies last.

2 free months when you pay annually.

DOUBLE THE DISK SPACE. Open a sales ticket after you order and we will double the disk space for free.

Add Direct Admin to any vps plan for $5 per month

Add 100mbps unmetered for $10 per month

Setup is instant unless the specific system has ran out of IPv4
Additional IPv4 addresses are $1.50 per month with justification.

$2.00 per month -512mb RAM - 1 CPU Cores - 20GB Solid State Space - 2TB Bandwidth @ 1Gbps - 1 IPv4
$4.00 per Month -1GB RAM - 2 CPU Cores - 30GB Solid State Space - 2TB @ 1Gbps - 1 IPv4
Plans are here
https://www.bigpowerhosting.com/vps-hosting.php

All vps plans are configurable for cpu cores,ram and bandwidth and ip addresses.

You may add your own iso.
